      • isEncoderCloseTo

        public boolean isEncoderCloseTo(double encoderGoal)
        returns if the current average of encoders (aka distance traveled) is close to the encoderGoal. Uses DRIVE_ENCODER_LENIENCY to tell if it is close.
        Parameters:
        encoderGoal - Encoder drive should be at
        Returns:
